DOC.brief_summary: Pump It Up! is a 4-year longitudinal study that provides intervention to adolescents (ages 10-18 years) with type 1 diabetes who use an insulin pump.
DOC.brief_title: Adherence Intervention to Promote Optimal Use of Insulin Pumps in Adolescents With Type 1 Diabetes
DOC.criteria: ages 1017 years type 1 diabetes diagnosis at least 1 year use insulin pump developmental delay
